name: Raccoon Heist
description:
You control two raccoons trying to rob a museum!

To move use A and D, and to jump use Spacebar. E to split or join the racoons and Q to switch between them.

All assets and code are made from scratch, except for:
“Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“
“Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com“
“Music from https://www.zapsplat.com“
Explosion from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/2d-flat-explosion-66932
